author: wglass
msg: Correct fix to VELOCITY-98.  If page writer alternates #parse and #include for the same file, the file needs to be reloaded (can't reuse the cache).

author: saminda
msg: 1. Changed sample code to cope with current Axis2 status
2. Logic of Axis2FlexibleMEPClient changed. Now this logic can hanlde transport configuration from main axis2.xml.
Now routing of messages can be done with any transport. I will put a document on this. {JIRA-5 is partially fixed}
